breadCrumbs.text: [ How will you build your bid pack? ]

title: Digital Outcomes opportunities
subtitle: View buyer requirements for digital outcomes and user research participants.

form.title: Dorset ICS Integration and Interoperability Review & Recommendation
form.subTitle: The NHS providers within the Dorset Integrated Care System (ICS)
form.description: The Objectives of the Engagement are to review the current integration and interoperability landscape within NHS Dorset and propose a target architecture that would be required to realise the strategic digital objectives of the ICS, with a priority focus on the active ICS PAS/EPR programme across DCH, UHD, DHC

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your one stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online (Coming soon)

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.
